title: Jennifer Garner’s Once Upon a Farm Valued at $724 Million in IPO
description: Once Upon a Farm PBC, the organic kids snacks maker co-founded by actress Jennifer Garner, and some of its investors raised $197.9 million in an initial public offering that priced at the midpoint of its marketed range.
content: Once Upon a Farm PBC, the organic kids snacks maker co-founded by actress Jennifer Garner, and some of its investors raised $197.9 million in an initial public offering that priced at the midpoint of its marketed range.
